mapper.sql: id, patient_id, schedule_id, user_id, department_id, room_id, status, fee, pay_fee, medicare_fee, is_medicare, registry_time, consultation_time, created_time, updated_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from registry
order by ${orderByClause}

select -- 查询病人信息 pa.`name` pName, case sex when 1 then "男" when 2 then "女" end pSex, pa.`id_card` pidCard, pa.`birthday` pBirthday, pa.`address` pAddress, -- 挂号信息 rg.`id` rgId, dp.`name` dName, rm.`name` rmName, su.`user_name` regDocName, rg.`registry_time` regTime, rg.`consultation_time` regConSulTime, rg.`created_time` createTime, -- 医嘱 ma.`chief_complaint` chiefComplaint, ma.`diagnosis` diagnosis, temp.user_name maUserName from registry rg left join patient pa on rg.`patient_id` = pa.`id` left join department dp on rg.`department_id` = dp.`id` left join room rm on rg.`room_id` = rm.`id` left join sys_users su on rg.`user_id` = su.`id` left join medical_advice ma on rg.`id` = ma.`registry_id` left join (select ma.`id`,su.`user_name` from medical_advice ma, sys_users su where ma.`user_id` = su.`id`)temp on temp.id = ma.`id` where rg.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into registry (id, patient_id, schedule_id, user_id, department_id, room_id, status, fee, pay_fee, medicare_fee, is_medicare, registry_time, consultation_time, created_time, updated_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scheduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{medicareFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isMedicare,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{registryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{consultationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into registry
id,
patient_id,
schedule_id,
user_id,
department_id,
room_id,
status,
fee,
pay_fee,
medicare_fee,
is_medicare,
registry_time,
consultation_time,
created_time,
updated_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{scheduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{payFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{medicareFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isMedicare,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{registryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{consultationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update registry
patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
schedule_id = #{scheduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_fee = #{payFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
medicare_fee = #{medicareFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_medicare = #{isMedicare,jdbcType=TINYINT},
registry_time = #{registryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
consultation_time = #{consultationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update registry set patient_id = #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, schedule_id = #{scheduleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_fee = #{payFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, medicare_fee = #{medicareFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_medicare = #{isMedicare,jdbcType=TINYINT}, registry_time = #{registryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, consultation_time = #{consultationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
